short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves Jira Cloud (*.atlassian.net) views to make issue management easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
All of the below features can be enabled/disabled via the extension's options page

Features:
Condensed View
Moves page elements closer together to save space

Input Improvements
Input (text fields, buttons, etc.) improvements:
Log work time spent field auto completion (based on input history)
Workflow drop down mouse cursor pointer

Issue Details Vertical Layout
Combines the issue detail panels into one vertical layout

Remove Issue Section Headers
Removes the issue section headers when expanded

Remove Nested Scrollbars
Removes the nested scroll bar on the filters view
